item.title: By: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.description:
I stand corrected! <a href="http://forums.worldofwarcraft.com/thread.aspx?fn=wow-general&t=1913432&p=1&tmp=1#post1913432" rel="nofollow">The forums are now operational!</a>
(And if there are any fanbois left, I know I'm an asshole. But, how hard is it to post a sticky saying that the boards are down and they don't know why and are working on it? Ya. Not hard at all.)
item.content:encoded:
I stand corrected! The forums are now operational!

(And if there are any fanbois left, I know I’m an asshole. But, how hard is it to post a sticky saying that the boards are down and they don’t know why and are working on it? Ya. Not hard at all.)

item.title: By: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFK Gamer
item.description:
Personally, I was hoping that the 1k banned accounts didn't include any false positives because the deafening din had died down on the boards. O wait ... maybe that's because the boards have been broken for two (plus?) days now. :)
Ya, I have concerns about the detective work also. It's like they have Clouseau running the show over there.
item.content:encoded:
Personally, I was hoping that the 1k banned accounts didn’t include any false positives because the deafening din had died down on the boards. O wait … maybe that’s because the boards have been broken for two (plus?) days now. ðŸ™‚

Ya, I have concerns about the detective work also. It’s like they have Clouseau running the show over there.

item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description: Yeah... but how many false positives are in that number? No Confidence in Blizzard's detective work, here.
item.content:encoded: Yeah… but how many false positives are in that number? No Confidence in Blizzard’s detective work, here.
